Name: Enable-DscDebug
Synopsis: Starts debugging of all DSC resources.

Name: Get-DscConfiguration
Synopsis: Gets the current configuration of the nodes.

Name: Get-DscConfigurationStatus
Synopsis: Retrieves data about completed configuration runs.

Name: Get-DscLocalConfigurationManager
Synopsis: Gets Local Configuration Manager (LCM) settings and states for the node.

Name: Get-DscResource
Synopsis: Gets Desired State Configuration (DSC) resources present on the computer.

Name: New-DscChecksum
Synopsis: Creates checksum files for DSC documents and DSC resources.

Name: Remove-DscConfigurationDocument
Synopsis: Removes a configuration document from the DSC configuration store.

Name: Restore-DscConfiguration
Synopsis: Reapplies the previous configuration for the node.

Name: Stop-DscConfiguration
Synopsis: Stops a configuration job that is running.

Name: Update-DscConfiguration
Synopsis: Checks the pull server for an updated configuration and applies it.

Name: Invoke-DscResource
Synopsis: Runs a method of a specified DSC resource.

Name: Publish-DscConfiguration
Synopsis: Publishes a DSC configuration to a set of computers.

Name: Set-DscLocalConfigurationManager
Synopsis: Applies Local Configuration Manager (LCM) settings to nodes.

Name: Test-DscConfiguration
Synopsis: Tests whether the actual configuration on the nodes matches the desired configuration.
